cards.name: Inventory Rebalance Optimizer
cards.description: Allocates finite resources across multiple locations to minimize stockouts while respecting budget constraints, lead times, and demand uncertainty.

origin.detail: Rebalancing seasonal consumer goods across multiple store locations

fork.detail: Medical supply allocation to field hospitals in crisis zones

adaptation_points.name: demand_model
adaptation_points.description: Swap seasonal ARIMA forecast for crisis surge detector using news feeds and displacement data

adaptation_points.name: constraint_solver
adaptation_points.description: Adjust optimization horizon (1hr–90 days) and objective weights (humanitarian: stockout weight 0.9+)

adaptation_points.name: explanation_language
adaptation_points.description: Swap English business report for multilingual field reports via Tarjimly-style translation

failure_modes.scenario: Stale inventory data (>24h)
failure_modes.impact: Transfer plan based on wrong stock levels

failure_modes.scenario: Demand forecast completely wrong (black swan)
failure_modes.impact: Suboptimal allocation, potential stockouts

failure_modes.scenario: Optimization concentrates resources in few locations
failure_modes.impact: Equity concerns — some locations get nothing

cards.name: Workforce Shift Scheduler
cards.description: Assigns people with specific skills and availability windows to time-bound roles across multiple locations, while respecting labor rules, fairness constraints, and individual preferences.

origin.detail: Scheduling part-time and full-time employees across retail store locations

fork.detail: Coordinating disaster relief volunteers with dynamic availability and burnout monitoring

adaptation_points.name: constraint_engine
adaptation_points.description: Adjust max hours (8→12), rest periods, and fairness windows for short-term volunteer deployments

adaptation_points.name: skill_matcher
adaptation_points.description: Swap retail skills for humanitarian competency framework (languages, security training, first aid)

adaptation_points.name: wellbeing_monitor
adaptation_points.description: Replace overtime tracker with responder burnout detector tracking cumulative stress indicators

failure_modes.scenario: Key skill gap unfilled — no qualified person available
failure_modes.impact: Critical role empty during shift

failure_modes.scenario: Optimizer prioritizes coverage over individual wellbeing
failure_modes.impact: Burnout, injury, or psychological harm

failure_modes.scenario: Unfair distribution goes undetected
failure_modes.impact: Resentment, volunteer attrition

cards.name: Budget Envelope Allocator
cards.description: Distributes a finite monetary budget across competing categories to maximize overall impact, respecting minimum commitments, maximum caps, and performance feedback from prior allocations.

origin.detail: Allocating monthly marketing budget across channels for RetailCo

fork.detail: Distributing donor funds across humanitarian response sectors (health, shelter, WASH)

adaptation_points.name: impact_model
adaptation_points.description: Replace marketing ROI model with humanitarian impact estimator (DALYs averted, beneficiaries reached)

adaptation_points.name: constraint_handler
adaptation_points.description: Handle donor earmarks, government co-funding requirements, and 15-20% flexibility reserves

adaptation_points.name: reporting_format
adaptation_points.description: Swap marketing dashboard for donor compliance reporter matching IATI standards

failure_modes.scenario: Impact model overestimates returns in one category
failure_modes.impact: Over-allocation to lower-impact area

failure_modes.scenario: Donor earmarks consume most of the budget
failure_modes.impact: Emerging needs can't be addressed

failure_modes.scenario: Cross-sector dependencies cause cascading underfunding
failure_modes.impact: Savings in one area create costs in another

cards.name: Pattern Anomaly Detector
cards.description: Monitors streams of events over time, learns what 'normal' looks like, detects deviations from normal patterns, determines if those deviations are significant, and triggers appropriate alerts with context.

origin.detail: Detecting fraudulent transactions in an retail e-commerce platform

fork.detail: Early disease outbreak detection in rural health networks via syndromic surveillance

adaptation_points.name: baseline_model
adaptation_points.description: Swap transaction baseline for epidemiological baseline with seasonal disease incidence rates

adaptation_points.name: anomaly_dimensions
adaptation_points.description: Replace transaction velocity with symptom clusters; extend correlation window from 1hr to 7-14 days

adaptation_points.name: alert_channel
adaptation_points.description: Replace dashboard with SMS escalation chain for rural areas

adaptation_points.name: false_positive_filter
adaptation_points.description: Account for vaccination campaigns, mass gatherings, and reporting artifacts

failure_modes.scenario: Real outbreak missed because it looked like a gradual trend
failure_modes.impact: Delayed public health response; preventable deaths

failure_modes.scenario: Alert fatigue causes responders to ignore real alerts
failure_modes.impact: True positives missed due to too many false positives

failure_modes.scenario: Reporting gap misinterpreted as 'no anomalies'
failure_modes.impact: Silence mistaken for safety

cards.name: Equipment Health Monitor
cards.description: Continuously monitors physical assets through sensor data or periodic inspections, detects degradation patterns, predicts failures before they occur, and recommends interventions prioritized by risk and cost.

origin.detail: Monitoring HVAC, refrigeration, and security systems across retail store locations

fork.detail: Assessing structural integrity of buildings and bridges after earthquakes using field reports and drone imagery

adaptation_points.name: assessment_model
adaptation_points.description: Replace degradation curves with ATC-20 damage classification (green/yellow/red tagging)

adaptation_points.name: data_source
adaptation_points.description: Accept drone photos, smartphone photos, OCR'd inspection forms, and community WhatsApp reports

adaptation_points.name: prioritization_logic
adaptation_points.description: Replace cost-based factors with occupancy count, structural criticality, and aftershock vulnerability

failure_modes.scenario: Unsafe building classified as safe
failure_modes.impact: Occupants at risk of collapse

failure_modes.scenario: Over-classification of damage causes unnecessary displacement
failure_modes.impact: People kept from homes unnecessarily

failure_modes.scenario: Aftershock changes damage level of previously assessed building
failure_modes.impact: Stale assessment creates false sense of safety

cards.name: Supply Chain Disruption Detector
cards.description: Monitors multiple signals across a supply chain to detect disruptions before they cause downstream shortages. Correlates supplier behavior, logistics data, market signals, and external events to produce early warnings.

origin.detail: Monitoring delivery reliability from consumer goods suppliers and detecting seasonal disruptions

fork.detail: Food security early warning using FEWS NET, WFP price monitoring, and satellite crop health data

adaptation_points.name: signal_sources
adaptation_points.description: Replace ERP feeds with FEWS NET alerts, NDVI vegetation indices, conflict data (ACLED), and displacement tracking

adaptation_points.name: disruption_classifier
adaptation_points.description: Use IPC food security phase classification: Minimal → Stressed → Crisis → Emergency → Famine

adaptation_points.name: propagation_model
adaptation_points.description: Extend from 2-tier supply chain to 5-6 tier food system with cross-border trade flows

failure_modes.scenario: Slow-onset crisis missed because each daily change is small
failure_modes.impact: Famine conditions develop without early warning

failure_modes.scenario: False alarm triggers premature food aid deployment
failure_modes.impact: Wasted resources, market disruption from aid flooding

failure_modes.scenario: Conflict zone data gaps create blind spots
failure_modes.impact: Most vulnerable populations invisible to the system

cards.name: Communication Triage & Router
cards.description: Ingests incoming messages from multiple channels, classifies them by urgency and topic, extracts key information, and routes them to the right responder — while handling language barriers automatically.

origin.detail: Routing customer support messages to the right team member based on topic and urgency

fork.detail: Multilingual crisis triage where distress messages are classified by life-or-death urgency

adaptation_points.name: urgency_classifier
adaptation_points.description: Replace retail priority with humanitarian severity scale: life-threatening → urgent medical → basic needs

adaptation_points.name: entity_extractor
adaptation_points.description: Extract GPS coordinates, affected people count, need types, and accessibility info

adaptation_points.name: translation_layer
adaptation_points.description: Integrate Tarjimly hybrid translation with human-in-the-loop for critical messages

adaptation_points.name: routing_strategy
adaptation_points.description: Reorder to language match → protection sensitivity → skill match → proximity

failure_modes.scenario: Life-threatening message misclassified as low priority
failure_modes.impact: Delayed response to someone in danger

failure_modes.scenario: Translation error changes meaning of message
failure_modes.impact: Wrong type of help sent, or wrong location

failure_modes.scenario: Sensitive protection case routed to wrong responder
failure_modes.impact: Breach of confidentiality, potential harm

cards.name: Daily Intelligence Briefer
cards.description: Collects information from multiple heterogeneous sources, identifies what's new or changed, synthesizes into a structured briefing calibrated to the audience, and highlights items requiring decisions.

origin.detail: Daily briefing for company leadership on competitor activity and market conditions

fork.detail: Daily situation reports from multiple field sources for crisis coordination leaders

adaptation_points.name: priority_ranker
adaptation_points.description: Rank by lives at risk, access deterioration, protection concerns, and displacement movements

adaptation_points.name: synthesizer
adaptation_points.description: Follow standard OCHA sitrep format: situation overview, needs, response, gaps, funding

adaptation_points.name: delivery_channel
adaptation_points.description: Email for HQ, WhatsApp for field, SMS summary for limited connectivity, voice briefing for hands-free

failure_modes.scenario: Critical development buried in low-priority section
failure_modes.impact: Decision-makers miss time-sensitive information

failure_modes.scenario: Unverified information presented as confirmed
failure_modes.impact: Decisions made on false information

failure_modes.scenario: Information overload makes briefing too long
failure_modes.impact: Audience stops reading; critical items missed

cards.name: Multi-Party Resource Negotiator
cards.description: Facilitates agreement between multiple parties with different goals, constraints, and information. Proposes solutions that satisfy as many parties as possible, identifies blockers, and suggests compromises.

origin.detail: Negotiating bulk purchase agreements with consumer goods suppliers

fork.detail: Multi-org resource sharing in humanitarian cluster coordination with affected population advocacy

adaptation_points.name: fairness_metric
adaptation_points.description: Replace price efficiency with needs-proportional fairness using vulnerability indices and Sphere Standards

adaptation_points.name: compromise_generator
adaptation_points.description: Domain-specific patterns: temporal sharing, geographic splitting, capability-based division

adaptation_points.name: communication_style
adaptation_points.description: Adapt formality, cultural sensitivity, and language for cross-cultural humanitarian coordination

adaptation_points.name: precedent_engine
adaptation_points.description: Database of past humanitarian who-does-what matrices and cluster coordination patterns

failure_modes.scenario: Agent proposes 'optimal' solution ignoring power dynamics
failure_modes.impact: Weaker parties feel railroaded; agreement doesn't hold

failure_modes.scenario: Deadlock resolution pushes premature agreement
failure_modes.impact: Bad agreement worse than no agreement

failure_modes.scenario: Cultural communication norms cause misunderstanding
failure_modes.impact: Offense, withdrawal, or false agreement

cards.name: Project Risk Cascade Planner
cards.description: Plans a sequence of interdependent activities where each step's outcome is uncertain and affects what's possible next. Identifies critical path risks, models cascade failures, and recommends contingency branches.

origin.detail: Managing construction project risks for retail store buildout

fork.detail: Disaster recovery sequencing: rescue → shelter → infrastructure → services → permanent housing

adaptation_points.name: risk_model
adaptation_points.description: Incorporate seismological aftershock models, funding pipeline uncertainty, and inter-org coordination friction

adaptation_points.name: priority_framework
adaptation_points.description: Life-saving infrastructure first: life → safety → essential services → economic activity → full recovery

adaptation_points.name: progress_tracker
adaptation_points.description: Accept mobile forms, photo evidence, GPS-tagged reports, and satellite imagery verification

failure_modes.scenario: Hidden dependency causes unexpected cascade
failure_modes.impact: Multiple activities blocked simultaneously

failure_modes.scenario: Overly optimistic replanning after delays
failure_modes.impact: Stakeholders given false hope

failure_modes.scenario: Plan complexity exceeds coordination capacity
failure_modes.impact: Organizations can't follow the plan

cards.name: Fleet Route Optimizer
cards.description: Optimizes routes for a fleet of vehicles to minimize total cost while satisfying delivery windows, vehicle capacity limits, driver hours regulations, and real-time road conditions.

origin.detail: Routing delivery fleet for regional distribution of consumer goods to retail locations and direct-to-customer deliveries.

fork.detail: Forked for humanitarian convoy routing with security risk scoring, checkpoint negotiation, conflict-aware routing, and multi-org deconfliction.

adaptation_points.name: routing_engine
adaptation_points.description: Core routing algorithm with commercial or conflict-aware alternatives

adaptation_points.name: road_condition_source
adaptation_points.description: Real-time road conditions from traffic APIs or field intelligence

adaptation_points.name: priority_logic
adaptation_points.description: Priority tiers for delivery prioritization and reroute thresholds

failure_modes.scenario: Route plan sends vehicle through newly dangerous area
failure_modes.impact: Driver and cargo at risk

failure_modes.scenario: Optimization over-packs routes leaving no buffer
failure_modes.impact: Cascading delays when any delivery takes longer than planned

failure_modes.scenario: Dynamic rerouting creates conflicting instructions
failure_modes.impact: Driver confusion, missed deliveries

cards.name: Regulatory Compliance Checker
cards.description: Continuously monitors activities against a ruleset, flags violations or potential violations, generates audit trails, and recommends corrective actions while adapting to changing regulations.

origin.detail: AML/KYC transaction monitoring for a financial services platform, screening against sanctions lists and suspicious activity patterns.

fork.detail: Forked for humanitarian donor compliance with donor condition engine, multi-donor reporting, exemption tracking, and partner screening.

adaptation_points.name: rule_engine
adaptation_points.description: Rule matching logic for financial AML or donor condition checking

adaptation_points.name: screening_service
adaptation_points.description: Entity screening against watchlists and sanctions lists

adaptation_points.name: reporting_format
adaptation_points.description: Compliance report templates (SAR or donor-specific formats)

failure_modes.scenario: True violation missed due to incomplete data
failure_modes.impact: Regulatory penalties, reputational damage, potential aid diversion

failure_modes.scenario: Overzealous screening blocks legitimate aid partner
failure_modes.impact: Aid delivery delayed to vulnerable populations

failure_modes.scenario: Rule interpretation error causes systematic miscategorization
failure_modes.impact: Entire category of activities incorrectly flagged or cleared

cards.name: Patient Risk Stratifier
cards.description: Scores individuals based on multiple risk factors to classify them into risk tiers, prioritize interventions, and predict which individuals are most likely to experience adverse outcomes without proactive intervention.

origin.detail: Scoring insurance policyholders on claims risk for underwriting decisions and proactive loss prevention outreach.

fork.detail: Forked for community health worker prioritization with clinical risk calculator, social determinants, mobile CHW interface, and bias auditing.

adaptation_points.name: risk_factors
adaptation_points.description: Factor weights and tier thresholds for risk scoring

adaptation_points.name: scoring_algorithm
adaptation_points.description: Actuarial risk model or clinical risk calculator

adaptation_points.name: output_interface
adaptation_points.description: Dashboard for underwriters or mobile priority list for CHWs

failure_modes.scenario: High-risk individual scored low due to missing data
failure_modes.impact: Missed intervention; preventable adverse outcome

failure_modes.scenario: Scoring model encodes demographic bias
failure_modes.impact: Systematic under-prioritization of certain groups

failure_modes.scenario: Risk scores used for denial of service rather than prioritization
failure_modes.impact: Vulnerable individuals excluded from care

cards.name: Environmental Impact Monitor
cards.description: Monitors environmental indicators against baseline conditions to detect significant deviations that signal emerging threats, distinguishes normal seasonal variation from meaningful anomalies, and triggers proportionate response protocols.

origin.detail: Continuous monitoring of corporate carbon emissions and environmental metrics for ESG reporting and sustainability tracking.

fork.detail: Forked for climate adaptation early warning in vulnerable communities with satellite monitoring, climate vulnerability indices, and low-connectivity alerts.

adaptation_points.name: data_sources
adaptation_points.description: Corporate emissions sensors, satellite imagery, or community-based monitoring

adaptation_points.name: threshold_framework
adaptation_points.description: Baseline definitions and anomaly tolerance levels

adaptation_points.name: alert_routing
adaptation_points.description: Executive dashboards or community radio and SMS alerts

adaptation_points.name: impact_forecast_model
adaptation_points.description: ESG reporting calculator or crop/water/health impact models

failure_modes.scenario: Slow-onset environmental change missed by anomaly detection
failure_modes.impact: Communities miss critical adaptation window

failure_modes.scenario: False reassurance from incomplete data
failure_modes.impact: Communities believe conditions are normal until crisis manifests

failure_modes.scenario: Impact forecast model fails to capture complex tipping points
failure_modes.impact: Warning comes too late for adequate response

cards.name: Safety Incident Predictor
cards.description: Tracks leading indicators, identifies patterns indicating elevated incident risk, and recommends time-sensitive interventions to prevent escalation across distributed information streams.

origin.detail: Workplace incident prediction in manufacturing plants using leading indicators to predict worker injury incidents.

fork.detail: Forked for conflict escalation early warning in peacekeeping contexts with conflict indicators, diplomatic interventions, and humanitarian assistance.

adaptation_points.name: indicator_model
adaptation_points.description: Manufacturing KPIs or conflict escalation indicators

adaptation_points.name: cascade_model
adaptation_points.description: Escalation pathways and cascade-breaking interventions

adaptation_points.name: intervention_recommender
adaptation_points.description: Manufacturing safety protocols or diplomatic and humanitarian responses

adaptation_points.name: decision_support_interface
adaptation_points.description: Safety officer dashboard or peacekeeping operations briefing

failure_modes.scenario: Sudden escalation without warning indicators
failure_modes.impact: Event occurs with no detectable precursor signals

failure_modes.scenario: Model trained on past incidents missing novel patterns
failure_modes.impact: Learned patterns obsolete but not recognized as such

failure_modes.scenario: Model bias creates systematic over-prediction for specific groups
failure_modes.impact: Groups disproportionately subject to intervention and scrutiny

cards.name: Customer Journey Orchestrator
cards.description: Guides individuals through a multi-stage process by predicting dropout risk at each stage, identifying barriers, and delivering personalized nudges to maintain momentum and support progression.

origin.detail: Guiding online shoppers through purchase funnel, predicting cart abandonment, and delivering personalized discounts and reminders.

fork.detail: Forked for refugee resettlement case management with trauma-informed communication, structural barrier detection, and autonomy safeguards.

adaptation_points.name: journey_stages
adaptation_points.description: Stage definitions, success criteria, and typical duration per stage

adaptation_points.name: barrier_detector
adaptation_points.description: E-commerce abandonment predictor or humanitarian barrier detector

adaptation_points.name: communication_engine
adaptation_points.description: Marketing email nudger or humanitarian case worker notification

adaptation_points.name: dropout_predictor
adaptation_points.description: Cart abandonment model or case abandonment model

failure_modes.scenario: Barriers are missed; dropout happens without warning
failure_modes.impact: Participant lost to follow-up; case abandoned

failure_modes.scenario: Algorithm nudges participant toward unsuitable path
failure_modes.impact: Refugee trapped in inappropriate situation due to pressure

failure_modes.scenario: Trauma-informed communication principles violated
failure_modes.impact: Algorithmic messages re-traumatize or manipulate vulnerable individual

cards.name: Dynamic Pricing Engine
cards.description: Adjusts prices or transfer values based on demand signals, competitive or market conditions, and fairness constraints to optimize revenue or purchasing power in real time.

origin.detail: Real-time pricing optimization for online retailer adjusting prices based on demand, inventory, and competitor prices.

fork.detail: Forked for humanitarian cash transfer programs — inverted objective from revenue maximization to purchasing power preservation with market basket monitoring.

adaptation_points.name: pricing_model
adaptation_points.description: Revenue maximization or purchasing power preservation objective

adaptation_points.name: market_signal_source
adaptation_points.description: Competitor pricing APIs or local market basket monitoring

adaptation_points.name: fairness_constraints
adaptation_points.description: Price variance ceiling, affordability floor, and price change frequency

failure_modes.scenario: Algorithm raises prices during demand surge
failure_modes.impact: Price-sensitive customers priced out; perceived unfairness

failure_modes.scenario: Transfer value insufficient to meet basic needs due to model error
failure_modes.impact: Beneficiaries cannot afford food or shelter; humanitarian harm

failure_modes.scenario: Model exploits conflict-driven price spikes
failure_modes.impact: Algorithm indirectly incentivizes market disruption or hoarding

cards.name: Travel Disruption Manager
cards.description: Detects disruption events, generates alternative routing or accommodation options, matches people to resources respecting constraints, and assesses cascading impacts on broader operations or populations.

origin.detail: Managing disruptions in corporate travel programs by automatically rebooking travelers on alternative flights and accommodations.

fork.detail: Forked for humanitarian mass displacement response at scale with security constraints, family unity preservation, and cascade impact assessment.

adaptation_points.name: disruption_detector
adaptation_points.description: Flight status monitor or conflict and disaster detector

adaptation_points.name: option_generator
adaptation_points.description: Rebooking engine or shelter availability and safe route matcher

adaptation_points.name: communication_channel
adaptation_points.description: Corporate travel app or UNHCR registration and community broadcasting

adaptation_points.name: cascade_impact_model
adaptation_points.description: Hotel occupancy impact or humanitarian infrastructure strain model

failure_modes.scenario: Routing algorithm separates family members
failure_modes.impact: Family trauma, children at risk, humanitarian harm

failure_modes.scenario: Routes people through insecure areas or unsafe shelters
failure_modes.impact: Risk of injury, violence, or re-displacement

failure_modes.scenario: Receiving shelter overwhelmed by arrivals
failure_modes.impact: Water shortage, disease outbreak, secondary displacement

cards.name: Adaptive Content Personalizer
cards.description: Segments audiences, generates tailored message variants, selects appropriate delivery channels, and incorporates cultural adaptation with feedback loops to continuously improve relevance and comprehension.

origin.detail: Personalizing marketing content for customer segments to maximize engagement and conversion.

fork.detail: Forked for public health messaging with health literacy segmentation, plain-language generation, cultural adaptation, and outcome-based feedback loops.

adaptation_points.name: segmentation_model
adaptation_points.description: Customer persona segmentation or health literacy and cultural segmentation

adaptation_points.name: content_generator
adaptation_points.description: Marketing copy engine or health literate plain language generator

adaptation_points.name: channel_selector
adaptation_points.description: Email/social/push router or low-resource channel selector

adaptation_points.name: feedback_loop
adaptation_points.description: Feedback sources, iteration frequency, and minimum feedback sample

failure_modes.scenario: Oversimplification loses medical accuracy
failure_modes.impact: People follow incorrect health guidance

failure_modes.scenario: Low-literacy population excluded by inaccessible variants
failure_modes.impact: Most vulnerable population receives no useful information

failure_modes.scenario: Cultural adaptation encodes bias or misrepresentation
failure_modes.impact: Message offensive or misaligned with community values

cards.name: Data Privacy Guardian
cards.description: Maps data flows, enforces consent-based access control, monitors data access, minimizes collection to necessary data, and detects breaches or policy violations across tech and humanitarian contexts.

origin.detail: GDPR/CCPA compliance for consumer tech platform — managing consent, restricting data access, and enabling data subject rights.

fork.detail: Forked for humanitarian beneficiary data protection with witnessed consent, threat-aware classification, ICRC standards, and hostile actor breach detection.

adaptation_points.name: regulatory_framework
adaptation_points.description: GDPR/CCPA compliance or ICRC humanitarian data protection

adaptation_points.name: consent_model
adaptation_points.description: Click-through consent or humanitarian witnessed consent

adaptation_points.name: data_classification
adaptation_points.description: Sensitivity categories and threat-aware dynamic reclassification

adaptation_points.name: breach_detection
adaptation_points.description: Anomaly signals and alert escalation protocols

failure_modes.scenario: Breach undetected; beneficiary data exposed to hostile actors
failure_modes.impact: Vulnerable populations targeted for persecution or violence

failure_modes.scenario: Consent formally valid but actually coerced
failure_modes.impact: Data collected unethically despite passing compliance checks

failure_modes.scenario: Data classification outdated; threat changes but classification doesn't
failure_modes.impact: Previously safe data becomes dangerous to expose

cards.name: Visual Damage Assessor
cards.description: Analyzes visual imagery (photos, satellite, drone) to detect and classify damage, grades severity level, compares before/after states, fuses multi-source data, and maps geographic damage distribution.

origin.detail: Processing insurance claims for vehicle and property damage — photos submitted by policyholders classified by severity for payout.

fork.detail: Forked for post-disaster damage assessment with satellite/drone/field imagery fusion, humanitarian need grades, and geographic damage mapping.

adaptation_points.name: image_classifier
adaptation_points.description: Insurance vehicle/property classifier or xBD building damage classifier

adaptation_points.name: damage_scale
adaptation_points.description: Grade definitions and secondary indicators for humanitarian context

adaptation_points.name: data_source
adaptation_points.description: Customer smartphone photos or multimodal satellite/drone/field fusion

adaptation_points.name: change_detection
adaptation_points.description: Temporal resolution and image registration method

failure_modes.scenario: Automated classification determines which communities get aid first
failure_modes.impact: Underestimated damage means delayed life-saving aid

failure_modes.scenario: Systematic bias in training data misclassifies certain building types
failure_modes.impact: Aid systematically misdirected; wealthy vs poor neighborhoods treated unequally

failure_modes.scenario: Cloud cover or poor resolution make assessment unreliable
failure_modes.impact: Assessment appears confident but is actually guessing

cards.name: Document Intelligence Extractor
cards.description: Ingests images or PDFs of documents, classifies document type, extracts structured data fields, validates against rules and reference databases, and returns machine-readable records with confidence scores.

origin.detail: Digitizing invoices and receipts for expense processing and accounts payable automation.

fork.detail: Forked for refugee document processing with multi-format classification, handwriting recognition, multilingual OCR, and incomplete reference database handling.

adaptation_points.name: document_models
adaptation_points.description: Invoice/receipt templates or 200+ ID format library

adaptation_points.name: extraction_rules

adaptation_points.name: validation_engine
adaptation_points.description: Accounting validation or identity verification

adaptation_points.name: ocr_pipeline
adaptation_points.description: Text recognition model, preprocessing, and language handling

failure_modes.scenario: Misclassified document type leads to wrong extraction schema
failure_modes.impact: Critical fields missed or misinterpreted; record is useless

failure_modes.scenario: OCR errors in critical fields (ID number, name, DOB)
failure_modes.impact: Person cannot be identified; records don't match

failure_modes.scenario: Handwriting misrecognized, producing plausible but wrong data
failure_modes.impact: Silent corruption: extracted data looks valid but is incorrect

cards.name: Infrastructure Capacity Planner
cards.description: Predicts future demand, monitors current capacity utilization, identifies bottlenecks and threshold breaches, and recommends scaling decisions to balance coverage, cost, and human welfare.

origin.detail: Auto-scaling compute and storage resources for cloud platform based on API traffic forecasts and cost optimization.

fork.detail: Forked for refugee camp infrastructure planning with population-driven demand models, physical resource units, logistics lead times, and Sphere Standards.

failure_modes.scenario: Over-provision capacity; waste limited funds

failure_modes.scenario: Plan for average consumption; peak demand causes failure

cards.name: Sentiment & Feedback Analyzer
cards.description: Aggregates feedback from multiple sources, classifies sentiment and themes, identifies emerging issues, prioritizes responses, and feeds community feedback back to decision-makers.

origin.detail: Aggregating product reviews from multiple platforms to understand customer sentiment and identify product quality issues.

fork.detail: Forked for community feedback analysis in humanitarian programs with multi-channel sources, humanitarian sentiment model, and feedback-to-action tracking.

adaptation_points.name: accountability_framework

failure_modes.scenario: Feedback from marginalized groups not collected
failure_modes.impact: Concerns of most vulnerable remain invisible

cards.name: Crisis Simulation & Scenario Planner
cards.description: Generates plausible crisis scenarios with probability estimates, simulates cascading impacts, estimates resource requirements and timelines, and produces contingency plans for organizational preparedness.

origin.detail: Stress testing investment portfolios and estimating capital requirements under financial crisis scenarios using Monte Carlo simulation.

fork.detail: Forked for humanitarian crisis scenario planning with population impact modeling, humanitarian supply calculations, and Sphere Standards integration.

adaptation_points.name: scenario_generator
adaptation_points.description: Financial shock scenarios or humanitarian crisis scenarios (disaster, conflict, disease)

adaptation_points.name: impact_model

adaptation_points.name: resource_calculator
adaptation_points.description: Capital requirement calculator or humanitarian supply calculator

adaptation_points.name: decision_model
adaptation_points.description: Decision points, option values, and authority chains

failure_modes.scenario: Scenario planning info leaked to combatants
failure_modes.impact: Prediction becomes weapon; neutrality compromised

failure_modes.scenario: Worst-case overestimated; resources wasted on unlikely scenarios
failure_modes.impact: Under-preparation for likely scenarios

failure_modes.scenario: Crisis trajectory differs from all scenarios
failure_modes.impact: Contingency plans don't match reality; poor improvisation

cards.name: Fraud Detection & Prevention Engine
cards.description: Identifies adversarial patterns in transactional data — account takeover, identity spoofing, synthetic fraud — by combining behavioral baselines with real-time signal analysis and adaptive thresholds.

origin.detail: Detecting fraudulent credit card transactions and account takeover attempts in real-time banking systems

fork.detail: Identifying staged accidents, inflated claims, and provider collusion in insurance claim submissions

adaptation_points.name: risk_scorer
adaptation_points.description: Swap transaction velocity model for claims pattern analyzer with provider network graph analysis

adaptation_points.name: identity_verifier
adaptation_points.description: Replace KYC document checker with claimant history cross-referencer and witness consistency analyzer

adaptation_points.name: threshold_tuner
adaptation_points.description: Adjust false-positive tolerance (finance: 1-2%, insurance: 5-8%) and escalation sensitivity per fraud category

adaptation_points.name: alert_dispatcher
adaptation_points.description: Swap real-time block/allow for SIU case queue with evidence packaging and regulatory filing

failure_modes.scenario: False positive blocks legitimate high-value transaction
failure_modes.impact: Customer churn, reputational damage, potential legal liability

failure_modes.scenario: Adversary reverse-engineers detection thresholds
failure_modes.impact: Fraud bypasses all automated controls

failure_modes.scenario: Model drift as fraud patterns evolve
failure_modes.impact: Declining catch rate, increasing losses over time

cards.name: Recommendation & Matching Engine
cards.description: Computes multi-dimensional compatibility scores between entities (people, products, opportunities) using collaborative filtering, content-based features, and contextual signals to surface the best matches.

origin.detail: Recommending products based on purchase history, browsing behavior, and similar customer profiles

fork.detail: Matching job seekers to openings using skills, experience, culture fit, and career trajectory analysis

adaptation_points.name: similarity_model
adaptation_points.description: Swap collaborative filtering for skills-gap analysis with weighted competency scoring and growth potential

adaptation_points.name: feature_extractor
adaptation_points.description: Replace purchase/browse signals with resume parsing, assessment scores, and behavioral interview signals

adaptation_points.name: ranking_weights
adaptation_points.description: Adjust dimension weights: skills match (0.3), culture fit (0.2), growth potential (0.2), location (0.15), compensation (0.15)

adaptation_points.name: feedback_loop
adaptation_points.description: Add interview outcome tracking, 90-day retention signal, and hiring manager satisfaction for model retraining

failure_modes.scenario: Filter bubble — recommendations reinforce narrow preferences
failure_modes.impact: Reduced discovery, user fatigue, declining engagement

failure_modes.scenario: Bias in training data produces discriminatory matches
failure_modes.impact: Legal liability, fairness violations, reputational harm

failure_modes.scenario: Cold start — insufficient data for new entities
failure_modes.impact: Poor initial recommendations, high early churn

cards.name: Knowledge Base Q&A Agent
cards.description: Retrieves relevant passages from organizational knowledge bases using semantic search, then generates accurate, cited answers with confidence scores and source attribution for verifiability.

origin.detail: Answering employee IT questions using internal wikis, runbooks, and ticket history with auto-escalation

fork.detail: Searching legal precedents, statutes, and case law to answer attorney queries with citation-ready references

adaptation_points.name: retriever
adaptation_points.description: Swap wiki/Confluence connector for legal database connector (Westlaw, LexisNexis) with citation-aware chunking

adaptation_points.name: answer_generator
adaptation_points.description: Replace conversational IT tone with formal legal analysis structure (IRAC: Issue, Rule, Application, Conclusion)

adaptation_points.name: confidence_threshold
adaptation_points.description: IT: 0.7 confidence ok; Legal: 0.9+ required with mandatory 'not legal advice' disclaimers below threshold

adaptation_points.name: source_ranker
adaptation_points.description: Add jurisdiction filtering, recency weighting, and court hierarchy prioritization for legal sources

failure_modes.scenario: Hallucinated answer presented with high confidence
failure_modes.impact: User acts on fabricated information; legal/medical risk

failure_modes.scenario: Stale knowledge base — answer was correct 6 months ago
failure_modes.impact: Outdated guidance applied to current situation

failure_modes.scenario: Retrieved passages are relevant but answer synthesis is wrong
failure_modes.impact: Correct sources, incorrect conclusion — harder to catch

cards.name: Approval Workflow Orchestrator
cards.description: Manages multi-step, multi-role approval chains with conditional routing, parallel approvals, escalation on timeout, delegation rules, and full audit trail for compliance-sensitive processes.

origin.detail: Routing expense reports through manager → finance → VP chains with auto-approval below thresholds

fork.detail: Orchestrating IRB review, sponsor approval, and regulatory submission with 21 CFR Part 11 compliance

adaptation_points.name: routing_engine
adaptation_points.description: Swap org-chart hierarchy routing for regulatory body routing (IRB → sponsor → FDA) with parallel review paths

adaptation_points.name: approval_rules
adaptation_points.description: Adjust thresholds, timeout periods (corporate: 48h, clinical: 30 days), quorum requirements, and veto rules

adaptation_points.name: compliance_logger
adaptation_points.description: Replace SOX audit trail with 21 CFR Part 11 electronic signatures and timestamped amendment tracking

adaptation_points.name: escalation_handler
adaptation_points.description: Add regulatory deadline tracking, patient safety escalation, and DSMB emergency review triggers

failure_modes.scenario: Approval bypassed due to routing logic error
failure_modes.impact: Unauthorized action taken; compliance violation; regulatory penalty

failure_modes.scenario: Escalation timeout missed — request stuck indefinitely
failure_modes.impact: Process blockage; missed deadlines; patient enrollment delayed

failure_modes.scenario: Delegation chain creates circular dependency
failure_modes.impact: Infinite loop; no one can approve; manual intervention required

cards.name: Onboarding & Training Sequencer
cards.description: Designs and delivers personalized learning paths based on role requirements, skill assessments, and real-time progress signals — adapting sequence, pace, and content difficulty dynamically.

origin.detail: Sequencing compliance training, tool setup, team introductions, and role-specific skill modules for new hires

fork.detail: Adapting rehabilitation exercise sequences based on recovery progress, pain tolerance, and mobility assessments

adaptation_points.name: assessment_engine
adaptation_points.description: Swap multiple-choice skill quizzes for physical therapy assessments (ROM measurements, pain scales, functional tests)

adaptation_points.name: content_library
adaptation_points.description: Replace training modules with exercise protocols, instructional videos, and progressive loading schedules

adaptation_points.name: pacing_algorithm
adaptation_points.description: Corporate: competency gates; Rehab: pain-gated progression with therapist override and plateau detection

adaptation_points.name: progress_tracker
adaptation_points.description: Add clinical outcome measures (FIM scores), insurance milestone reporting, and discharge readiness prediction

failure_modes.scenario: Assessment misclassifies skill level — wrong starting point
failure_modes.impact: Boredom (too easy) or overwhelm (too hard); disengagement

failure_modes.scenario: Rehab: progresses patient too fast past pain threshold
failure_modes.impact: Reinjury; setback in recovery; potential harm

failure_modes.scenario: Content gaps — no module exists for identified skill gap
failure_modes.impact: Incomplete learning path; false completion signal

cards.name: Contract & Legal Clause Analyzer
cards.description: Extracts obligations, deadlines, risk clauses, and compliance gaps from legal documents using NLP-powered clause identification, cross-reference resolution, and configurable risk taxonomies.

origin.detail: Reviewing vendor contracts for unfavorable terms, auto-renewal traps, liability exposure, and SLA gaps

fork.detail: Parsing humanitarian donor agreements for earmarking restrictions, reporting deadlines, and co-funding obligations

adaptation_points.name: clause_classifier
adaptation_points.description: Swap commercial clause taxonomy (indemnity, IP, SLA) for donor clause taxonomy (earmarks, conditions, reporting)

adaptation_points.name: risk_scorer
adaptation_points.description: Replace financial risk model with compliance risk model (donor audit probability, reputational risk, beneficiary impact)

adaptation_points.name: deadline_extractor
adaptation_points.description: Adjust date parsing for fiscal year formats, humanitarian reporting cycles, and multi-timezone coordination

adaptation_points.name: output_formatter
adaptation_points.description: Swap legal memo format for donor compliance matrix with RAG status indicators and action items

failure_modes.scenario: Missed obligation clause — deadline passes without action
failure_modes.impact: Contract breach; financial penalty; relationship damage

failure_modes.scenario: Misclassified clause severity — critical risk marked as low
failure_modes.impact: Unmitigated exposure; surprise liability

failure_modes.scenario: Cross-reference resolution fails in complex multi-party agreements
failure_modes.impact: Obligations attributed to wrong party; incomplete risk picture

cards.name: Meeting Summarizer & Action Tracker
cards.description: Processes meeting transcripts to extract key decisions, action items with assignees and deadlines, open questions, and sentiment shifts — then tracks follow-through across subsequent meetings.

origin.detail: Summarizing daily standups, sprint retrospectives, and quarterly all-hands with Jira/Slack integration

fork.detail: Processing inter-agency coordination meetings (OCHA clusters) with multi-language support and crisis-priority action tracking

adaptation_points.name: transcription_source
adaptation_points.description: Swap Zoom/Teams API for field radio transcription, WhatsApp voice notes, and satellite phone call logs

adaptation_points.name: action_classifier
adaptation_points.description: Replace Jira ticket creation with humanitarian action tracking (3W: Who does What Where) and OCHA reporting

adaptation_points.name: language_handler
adaptation_points.description: Add multi-language transcript processing with code-switching detection and terminology standardization

adaptation_points.name: priority_schema
adaptation_points.description: Swap sprint priority for humanitarian urgency (life-saving → time-critical → important → routine)

failure_modes.scenario: Action item attributed to wrong person
failure_modes.impact: Task falls through cracks; no one takes ownership

failure_modes.scenario: Transcription errors in technical terms or proper nouns
failure_modes.impact: Garbled action items; confusion about specifics

failure_modes.scenario: Sensitive information in summary shared to wrong audience
failure_modes.impact: Security breach; protection concerns in humanitarian contexts

cards.name: Energy & Sustainability Optimizer
cards.description: Optimizes energy consumption, carbon emissions, and resource waste across operations by modeling usage patterns, forecasting demand, and recommending operational changes within sustainability targets.

origin.detail: Optimizing heating, cooling, and lighting schedules across commercial buildings to minimize energy costs and carbon footprint

fork.detail: Managing irrigation schedules, water allocation, and drought response across agricultural operations with groundwater preservation

adaptation_points.name: consumption_model
adaptation_points.description: Swap HVAC thermal model for crop evapotranspiration model with soil moisture sensors and weather forecast integration

adaptation_points.name: optimization_objective
adaptation_points.description: Adjust weights: cost (0.3), carbon (0.3), comfort/yield (0.25), resilience (0.15) — agriculture adds aquifer sustainability

adaptation_points.name: sensor_interface
adaptation_points.description: Replace BMS/IoT building sensors with agricultural sensors (soil moisture, NDVI satellite, flow meters, rain gauges)

adaptation_points.name: reporting_engine
adaptation_points.description: Add ESG reporting, carbon credit calculations, and regulatory compliance (EU Taxonomy, TCFD, water rights)

failure_modes.scenario: Optimization sacrifices comfort/yield for efficiency targets
failure_modes.impact: Building occupant complaints; crop failure; economic loss

failure_modes.scenario: Sensor failure provides false low-consumption readings
failure_modes.impact: Overuse goes undetected; aquifer depletion; equipment damage

failure_modes.scenario: Weather forecast error compounds optimization decisions
failure_modes.impact: Sub-optimal resource allocation for 24-48h; recovery lag

cards.name: Multi-Agent Task Delegator
cards.description: Decomposes complex goals into subtasks, assigns them to specialized agents based on capability matching, manages dependencies and parallel execution, handles failures with retry and fallback strategies.

origin.detail: Orchestrating code generation, review, testing, and deployment agents in an automated CI/CD pipeline

fork.detail: Coordinating assessment, logistics, medical, shelter, and WASH agents in multi-sector emergency response

adaptation_points.name: task_decomposer
adaptation_points.description: Swap code-task DAG builder for humanitarian response plan decomposer with sector dependencies and access constraints

adaptation_points.name: agent_registry
adaptation_points.description: Replace developer tool agents with humanitarian sector agents (health, shelter, WASH, protection, logistics)

adaptation_points.name: failure_strategy
adaptation_points.description: Software: retry 3x then fail; Humanitarian: degrade gracefully, never fully fail, always produce partial result

adaptation_points.name: priority_resolver
adaptation_points.description: Swap sprint priority for life-saving priority with resource contention resolution and ethical triage logic

failure_modes.scenario: Circular dependency in task graph — deadlock
failure_modes.impact: Entire pipeline halts; no output produced; timeout waste

failure_modes.scenario: Agent capability mismatch — task assigned to wrong specialist
failure_modes.impact: Low-quality output cascades to dependent tasks

failure_modes.scenario: Parallel execution race condition corrupts shared state
failure_modes.impact: Inconsistent results; non-deterministic failures

cards.name: Predictive Maintenance Scheduler
cards.description: Predicts when equipment or infrastructure will fail using sensor data, usage patterns, and degradation models — then optimally schedules maintenance windows to minimize downtime and cost.

origin.detail: Predicting CNC machine, conveyor, and robotic arm failures using vibration, temperature, and cycle count data

fork.detail: Scheduling maintenance for MRI machines, ventilators, and infusion pumps with patient-safety-first prioritization

adaptation_points.name: degradation_model
adaptation_points.description: Swap mechanical wear curves for medical device calibration drift models with regulatory compliance windows (FDA/IEC)

adaptation_points.name: sensor_pipeline
adaptation_points.description: Replace industrial IoT (vibration, thermal) with medical device telemetry (error logs, calibration drift, usage hours)

adaptation_points.name: scheduling_optimizer
adaptation_points.description: Manufacturing: minimize production downtime; Medical: patient safety first, then minimize procedure cancellations

adaptation_points.name: compliance_tracker
adaptation_points.description: Add FDA 21 CFR 820 maintenance records, Joint Commission readiness, and manufacturer service agreement tracking

failure_modes.scenario: Predicted 30 days remaining but fails in 2 days
failure_modes.impact: Unplanned downtime; production halt; patient safety risk in medical

failure_modes.scenario: Over-maintenance — too many false predictions of imminent failure
failure_modes.impact: Unnecessary downtime; wasted parts and labor; reduced trust in system

failure_modes.scenario: Sensor data gap — missing telemetry during critical period
failure_modes.impact: Model operates blind; predictions revert to time-based fallback
